metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36307 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Redmine before 4.0.7 and 4.1.x before 4.1.1 has stored XSS via textile inline links.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36307` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 5.0.2-2
redmine-mysql - 5.0.2-2
redmine-pgsql - 5.0.2-2
redmine-sqlite - 5.0.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.2-2').
